data.title: A Century After His Birth, Saul Bellow's Prose Still Sparkles
data.meta_description: Bellow's centennial is being marked with reprints and a new biography. Today, critics still savor his metaphor-rich prose; his son remembers the personal pain the great writer caused.
data.text:
